text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
Hi.

I'm Aiden Feng, and
this is Adeel Yang.
We're co-founders of Medumo.

We manage patient
instructions for hospitals.

So we launched our product
less than a year ago,

and we now have 22
hospitals as customers,

including five of the top
20 hospitals in the world.

We have one million
in annual recurring

revenue and 6.8 million
inside letters of intent.
So what problem are we solving?

Patient instructions
today are terrible.

They're a combination of
papers and verbal instructions,

causing patients to show up
to procedures and surgeries

unprepared, if they
show up at all.

And this costs hospitals in
the US $24 billion per year.

So at Medumo, we deliver
bite-size instructions

just in time so that
patients don't miss a step.

Let's pretend you're
having surgery.

We'll tell you everything
you need to know day by day

through text message, email,
with multimedia content

and checking questions to guide
you every step of the way.

Just by tracking your
interaction with our system,

we can actually tell if you're
at risk of failing or canceling
last-minute.

There are 10,000 hospitals and
surgical centers in the US,

and that is a $2.5 billion
revenue opportunity for us.
So in summary, we are Medumo.

We bring peace of mind to
you and your loved ones.
Thank you.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
